choices: Someone to ask for the Sos Brigades assistants
1.content:
A young man nicknamed Kyon was staring out the window of his classroom while stealing quick glances at one Miss Haruhi Suzumiya
'Some times I wonder what Haruhi would do if she find out that she is this realitys god, Or the fact her SOS brigade, is comprised of all the things she has been waiting to meet including Yuki Nagato the Alien, Mikuru Asahina the time traveler, and Itsuki Koizumi the Esper.'
The school bell rings its time for?
1.title: Not another day

choices: She uses her powers to make the world a better place for everyone.
She uses her powers to fill the world with all sorts of supernatural things.
She just wants to use her powers to have as much fun as possible.
She doesn't know exactly what she wants to do with her powers yet...
She won't use them just yet, and is content with her "normal" life... For now...
12.content:
As the bell rang, Kyon stood up and trudged over to the SOS brigade's clubroom. Haruhi had called a club meeting earlier in the day, and Kyon knew that if it was Haruhi's idea, it could only spell trouble for him. Still, he also knew that ignoring Haruhi would only make things worse for him (and everyone else in the world) in the long run. As he approached the club door, he knocked on it to make sure that it was safe to enter. After all, there had been too many incidents of him walking in while Haruhi was in the middle of stripping Mikuru naked and forcing her into one of many costumes for him to just keep entering the room normally. Then again, was anything ever normal with Haruhi around? Kyon paused to remember how calm things had been before that hyperactive 'god' entered his school. Ever since that day, things had become anything but normal for him.

It was at this point that Haruhi herself opened the door.

"Hurry up Kyon! You're making everyone wait on you!" Haruhi then grabbed Kyon by the tie of his school uniform and dragged him into the room.

Once inside the clubroom, Kyon took his usual seat at the table in the center of the room. Looking around, he saw that Mikuru was once again dressed in her maid outfit and preparing to serve everyone tea, Nagato was sitting in the corner and reading another of her books, and Koizumi was simply standing next to Haruhi as she sat in her own chair reserved chair by the room's window. Mikuru placed a cup of tea in front of Kyon, which he politely thanked her for before taking a sip. He then began to question Haruhi about the nature of the meeting.

"So, do you mind telling me what you dragged us all in here for today? Let me guess; you found some crop circles in a nearby park and want us to go investigate, right?"

"Wrong!" Haruhi yelled while slamming her fist down on her desk, which caused the shy and nervous Mikuru to jump in shock (nearly spilling the remaining tea all over herself, but managing to catch it just in time).

"Okay, then why did our fearless leader call us in today? Huh?"

"Well, you remember that time when you told me that these three were espers, time travelers, and aliens?"

Kyon spit out his mouthful of tea in shock as he heard her bring this up, and the other three simply stared at him with mixed expressions on their faces. Kyon knew the time she was referring to: It was right after they had finished filming their club's movie for the school festival, and while it was true that he had told her this, Haruhi had simply brushed it off as him joking. Well, at least he thought she had...

"Uh, yeah, I remember... But, ummm, why are you bringing that up now?" Kyon stuttered nervously, not liking the direction that this conversation was heading.

"Well, at first I thought that you were just joking around, but then I decided 'Hey, Kyon doesn't have a sense of humor! Maybe he was actually being serious about that!'. So after that, I spent a few days following Mikuru around and spying on her to see if she was really a time traveler like you said."

Mikuru gasped in a mixture of surprise and embarrassment at that last statement.

"*gulp* So, what'd you find out?" Kyon asked, now visibly nervous.

"Well, Mikuru was boring as usual... Nothing interesting happened at all! So then I decided to spy on Yuki and see if she was an humanoid-alien-interface-whatchamacallit..."

"Data Humanoid Interface" Nagato corrected without showing any emotion at all. Kyon simply facepalmed at Nagato's willingness to give up her secret identity.

"Yeah, that! Well, anyway, I didn't find anything with her either, so it all came down to Itsuki. I followed him around for a few days too, and nothing exciting happened at first... But then, right when I was getting really annoyed and thinking about giving up, he just disappeared out of nowhere! I walked up to where he was standing when he vanished and searched around, and then I found some sort of invisible wall there. I went through it and ended up in a weird area with a gray sky and all these weird light-giant-things trashing the place! It was just like that time that you and I got trapped on the school campus together and couldn't leave! I knew I was on to something at that point, so I looked around for a bit and saw Itsuki flying around and blasting the heck out of one of those giants! That was all the proof I needed to decide that you were telling the truth back then, Kyon!"

"Uh... That's great Haruhi..." Kyon responded, now looking away from her nervously, as the situation was only escalating.

"What, is that all you have to say?! So what are you then? An alien, an esper, maybe a slider? I know that there must be more to this that you aren't telling me, Kyon! Come on, out with it!" Haruhi demanded, the look of excitement clearly visible on her face.

At this point, Koizumi and the others decided to step in. Seeing as how Kyon had already blown their cover, they decided that it was only a matter of time before Haruhi discovered her own true identity. They proceeded to explain everything to her, down to the smallest detail. Haruhi herself was amazed to learn that she possessed such an incredible power, and she began to think of what to do next now that she had all of this new information.


What will Haruhi Suzumiya do now that she knows that she's god?!
12.title: The Secret is Blown?!

choices: Haruhi wants to talk to the others first.
Haruhi goes crazy and wants to remake the world. (Destroy and remake.)
Haruhi thinks that she should make the world fun for her. (Fetish.)
123.content:
"I can't believe it really. All this time I spent looking for something unusual or super natural I was surrounded but the most unusual people on the planet! But now all I want to know is why all of you just showed up when I wished for it? And why did the others leave after I said that i found out what they were?" Haruhi said as she looked at Kyon.

"Well maybe they just didn't want you to find out? If I was an alien or a time traveler I won't want someone finding it out." Kyon said hoping Mrs.Suzumiya would buy the lie.

"Don't lie to me! If they didn't want anyone to find out then they wouldn't tell you! So why wouldn't they tell me but were so willing to tell you? Was it all because I just wished for it?" Haruhi said as she started to think?

Oh no! If Haruhi found out she was a god then she would start to change the world. Just think of all the crazy things she would do with her new powers? This was what everyone was trying to avoid. Would the world end just because she wanted a new one? Kyon looked over at Haruhi and watched as she thought about what she just said.

"I got it! i know how to prove if I can just wish for things! I'll do just that, I'll wish for something!" She said as she started to wish for something.

Just then, Mikuru walked back in and saw Haruhi looking at her. Mikuru was a little nervous. Haruhi has always liked to mess with her. Even before she started to learn she had powers she would make her wear bunny girl outfits and sexy maid costumes. What would Haruhi do to her now that she had the power to do anything she wanted!

"Oh Mikuru, Come here a minute." Haruhi said calling over the cute young girl.

Mikuru couldn't help but walk up to the leader of the brigade. Haruhi looked at Mikuru's body and then grabbed her breast just like last time. Mikuru started to scream just like last time. But before Kyon could step in and save her, something started to happen. Mikuru's breast had started to grow! Her school uniform was starting to push out as her breast grow more and more. Her shirt was about to rip before her breast stopped growing.

"Just like I thought. I guess I have the power to change everything around me!" Haruhi smiled as she let Mikuru go.

"So you finally found out you're a god? this isn't good. Now reality will fall apart and the world as we know it will be ripped apart!" Mikuru said as she tried to hid her jumbo sized breast!.

"What are you talking about Mikuru?" Haruhi said looking down at Mikuru as she was about to cry.

"Haruhi, Change Mikuru back. You've had your fun now change Mikuru back to normal." Kyon said unable to look away from Mikuru's massive new boobs barely contained by her shirt.

"Fine. But I'm not done having fun. I still want to use my god powers to change the world and make it more interesting." Haruhi said as she snapped her fingers and Mikuru changed back to normal.

"I think you should go easy on the powers Haruhi. You only just learned you have them and You might want to talk with the others before you go crazy?" Kyon said hopping Haruhi would agree.....
123.title: Haruhi, Awakened!

choices: all the girls were 100 feet tall

Haruhi thought for a bit, she laughed a little, "Turning everyone into Haruhi Suzumiya people would be fun." she plotted, but them she looked confused, "What would Haruhi Suzumiya people be?"
She summoned up piece of paper, and a pen, and wrote out the various possibilities, while making it so the paper wouldn't bend at all.

A little narcissistic, but still fun. I will...
